title: The Right Stuff: Some Episodes in the Career of a North Briton
author: Hay, Ian
snippet: Then cameanother--"Murrayfield, Haymarket, and Nether Liberton." Another blank!Then, "Marchmont Road and Churchill." Foiled again, Robert was beginningto feel a little sceptical as to the actual existence of the Dalry Road,when a car drew up opposite to him labelled "Pilrig and Gorgie."

title: The Right Stuff: Some Episodes in the Career of a North Briton
author: Hay, Ian
snippet: Then cameanother--"Murrayfield, Haymarket, and Nether Liberton." Another blank!Then, "Marchmont Road and Churchill." Foiled again, Robert was beginningto feel a little sceptical as to the actual existence of the Dalry Road,when a car drew up opposite to him labelled "Pilrig and Gorgie."

title: The Ossians
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: They were walking under the arch at the bottom of the path, heading towards the Marchmont Road flat that Connor, Hannah and Danny rented between them. The arch was twelve feet high and made of a whale's jawbone.
